character_gating.description: Events locked until required characters recruited

spoiler_log.description: Generated log file also contains event rewards and other detailed information

start_average_level.description: Recruited characters start at the average character level

start_naked.description: Recruited characters start with no equipment

character_stat_random_percent.description: Each character stat set to random percent of original within given range

fast_swdtech.description: SwdTech gauge charges four times faster

swdtechs_everyone_learns.description: SwdTechs learnable by characters without the SwdTech command

bum_rush_last.description: Bum Rush requires learning every other blitz

blitzes_everyone_learns.description: Blitzes learnable by characters without the Blitz command

lores_mp_random_percent.description: Each lore's MP cost set to random percent of original within given range

lores_everyone_learns.description: Lores learnable by characters without the Lore command

rages_no_leap.description: Leap not available on the Veldt. Rages learnable after every battle

rages_no_charm.description: Charm ability not available from Nightshade rage

dances_display_abilities.description: Display ability names in dance skills menu

dances_no_stumble.description: Disable stumbling when dancing in different terrain

dances_everyone_learns.description: Dances learnable by characters without the Dance command

steal_chances_higher.description: Steal Rate is improved and rare steals are more likely

steal_chances_always.description: Steal will always succeed if enemy has an item

random_exclude_command1.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

random_exclude_command2.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

random_exclude_command3.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

random_exclude_command4.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

random_exclude_command5.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

random_exclude_command6.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

no_exp_party_divide.description: Do not divide experience by number of surviving party members

level_scaling_average.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to %(metavar)s * party average level

level_scaling_highest.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to %(metavar)s * highest level in party

level_scaling_ce.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each character recruited and esper acquired

level_scaling_ced.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

level_scaling_checks.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each check completed

level_scaling_time.description: Enemies and bosses gain 1 level every %(metavar)s minutes

hp_mp_scaling_average.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * party averaage level

hp_mp_scaling_highest.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * highest level in party

hp_mp_scaling_ce.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited and esper acquired

hp_mp_scaling_ced.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

hp_mp_scaling_checks.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each check completed

hp_mp_scaling_time.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales every %(metavar)s minutes

xp_gp_scaling_average.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * party averaage level

xp_gp_scaling_highest.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * highest level in party

xp_gp_scaling_ce.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited and esper acquired

xp_gp_scaling_ced.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

xp_gp_scaling_checks.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each check completed

xp_gp_scaling_time.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales every %(metavar)s minutes

ability_scaling_element.description: Enemy and boss abilities retain element and increase in tier approximately every (%(metavar)s + 3) levels reaching max tier at level (%(metavar)s + 3) * 8

ability_scaling_random.description: Enemy and boss abilities increase in tier approximately every (%(metavar)s + 3) levels reaching max tier at level (%(metavar)s + 3) * 8

max_scale_level.description: Max level enemies scaled up to. Note: distortion levels still applied

scale_eight_dragons.description: Apply scaling to the eight dragons

scale_final_battles.description: Apply scaling to the final battles

shuffle_random_phunbaba3.description: Apply Shuffle/Random to Phunbaba 3 (otherwise he will only appear in Mobliz WOR)

boss_normalize_distort_stats.description: Normalize lower boss stats and apply random distortion

fixed_encounters_random.description: Fixed encounters are randomized. Lete River, Serpent Trench, Mine Cart, Imperial Camp, ...

encounters_escapable_random.description: Percent of random encounters escapable including with warp or smoke bombs

doom_gaze_no_escape.description: Doom Gaze does not escape and cannot be escaped from

wrexsoul_no_zinger.description: Wrexsoul does not use Zinger to possess a character until they expire

magimaster_no_ultima.description: MagiMaster does not cast Ultima before death

chadarnook_more_demon.description: Chadarnook demon form appears for longer and does not immediately switch back to painting

esper_spells_random_rates.description: Original esper spells with random learn rates

esper_spells_shuffle.description: Esper spells shuffled with original learn rates

esper_spells_shuffle_random_rates.description: Esper spells shuffled with random learn rates

esper_spells_random.description: Esper spells and learn rates randomized

esper_spells_random_tiered.description: Esper spells and learn rates randomized by tier

esper_mp_random_value.description: Each esper's MP cost set to random value within given range

esper_mp_random_percent.description: Each esper's MP cost set to random percent of original within given range

esper_equipable_random.description: Each esper equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

esper_equipable_balanced_random.description: Each esper equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of espers equipable by each character is balanced

esper_multi_summon.description: Espers can be summoned multiple times in battle

natural_magic1.description: Character to learn Terra's natural magic

random_natural_levels1.description: Randomize levels Terra learns natural spells

natural_magic2.description: Character to learn Celes' natural magic

random_natural_levels2.description: Randomize levels Celes learns natural spells

natural_magic_menu_indicator.description: Add indicator to status menu for characters with natural magic

start_moogle_charms.description: Start game with %(metavar)s Moogle Charms. Overrides No Moogle Charms option

start_tools.description: Start game with %(metavar)s different random tools

item_equipable_random.description: Each item equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

item_equipable_balanced_random.description: Each item equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of items equipable by each character is balanced

item_equipable_original_random.description: Characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

item_equipable_shuffle_random.description: Shuffle character equipment. After randomization, characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

item_equipable_relic_random.description: Each relic equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

item_equipable_relic_balanced_random.description: Each relic equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of relics equipable by each character is balanced

item_equipable_relic_original_random.description: Characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each relic they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each relic they could previously equip

item_equipable_relic_shuffle_random.description: Shuffle character relics. After randomization, characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

cursed_shield_battles.description: Number of battles required to uncurse the cursed shield

moogle_charm_all.description: All characters can wear Moogle Charm relics which prevent random battles. Overrides Equipable option

swdtech_runic_all.description: All weapons enable swdtech and runic

stronger_atma_weapon.description: Atma Weapon moved to higher tier and divisor reduced from 64 to 32

shop_inventory_shuffle_random.description: Shop inventories randomized based on type. All weapon shops randomized, all armor shops, etc...

shop_inventory_random_tiered.description: Shop inventories randomized based on type and tier. All weapon shops randomized, all armor shops, etc...

shop_prices_random_value.description: Each item cost set to random value within given range

shop_prices_random_percent.description: Each item cost set to random percent of original within given range

no_priceless_items.description: Assign values to items which normally sell for 1 gold. Recommended with random inventory

shops_no_breakable_rods.description: Poison, Fire, Ice, Thunder, Gravity, and Pearl Rods not sold in shops

shops_no_elemental_shields.description: Flame, Ice, and Thunder Shields not sold in shops

shops_no_super_balls.description: Super Balls not sold in shops

shops_no_exp_eggs.description: Exp. Eggs not sold in shops

chest_contents_shuffle_random.description: Chest contents shuffled and given percent randomized

chest_contents_random_scaled.description: Chest contents randomized by tier. Probability of higher tiers begins low and increases as more chests are opened

coliseum_rewards_visible_random.description: Random number of rewards within given range visible before beginning the match. Remaining rewards will display as question marks

coliseum_rewards_menu.description: Display rewards in item selection menu. Hidden rewards will display as question marks

coliseum_no_exp_eggs.description: Exp. Eggs will not appear in coliseum

coliseum_no_illuminas.description: Illuminas will not appear in coliseum

auction_random_items.description: Normal items randomized. Does not affect unbuyable items or Golem/Zoneseek slots

auction_no_chocobo_airship.description: Unbuyable talking chocobo and 1/1200 airship not offered to increase odds of items/espers

auction_door_esper_hint.description: Door NPC indicates whether espers are still available

no_moogle_charms.description: Moogle Charms will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

no_exp_eggs.description: Exp. Eggs will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

no_illuminas.description: Illuminas will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

no_ultima.description: Ultima cannot be learned from espers/items/natural magic

no_free_paladin_shields.description: Paladin/Cursed Shields will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events (Narshe WOR exclusive)

no_free_characters_espers.description: Remove character/esper rewards from: Auction House, Collapsing House, Figaro Castle Throne, Gau's Father's House, Kohlingen Inn, Narshe Weapon Shop, Sealed Gate, South Figaro Basement

permadeath.description: Life spells cannot be learned. Fenix Downs unavailable (except from starting items). Buckets/inns/tents/events do not revive characters. Phoenix casts Life 3 on party instead of Life

fix_sketch.description: Sketch missing will not cause various major glitches

fix_evade.description: Evade used for physical attacks instead of mblock. Fixes Beads, Blind, and other status effect influences

fix_vanish_doom.description: Vanish does not override instant death immunity

fix_retort.description: Retort will not counter various actions infinitely with Imp status

fix_jump.description: Fix characters disappearing as a result of jump/super ball/launcher interactions

fix_boss_skip.description: Poltergeist and Inferno in Kefka's Tower cannot be skipped

fix_enemy_damage_counter.description: Enemy damage counters only trigger if HP is reduced

auto_sprint.description: Player always sprints. Sprint Shoes have no effect

original_name_display.description: Display original character names in party and party select menus

random_rng.description: Randomize in-game RNG table. Affects Setzer's Slots, Auction House, Ebot's Rock, ...

random_clock.description: Randomize clock's correct time and NPC clues in Zozo

scan_all.description: All enemies scannable. All characters start with scan learned. Scan costs 0 MP. Useful for testing/debugging

event_timers_random.description: Collapsing House, Opera House, and Floating Continent timers randomized

event_timers_none.description: Collapsing House, Opera House, and Floating Continent timers removed

y_npc_imperial.description: Transform NPC into random imperial unit

y_npc_main.description: Transform NPC into random main character

y_npc_vanish_xzone.description: Cast vanish and x-zone on NPC

flashes_remove_worst.description: Removes only the worst flashes from animations. Ex: Learning Bum Rush, Bum Rush, Quadra Slam/Slice, Flash, etc.

flashes_remove_most.description: Removes most flashes from animations. Includes Kefka Death.
